name: Break My Heart
description:
Break My Heart is a game where each player controls a heart and a ninja star
connected by a stretchable line. There are three game modes and their goals are
different:

- Battle: Touch your ninja star to the opponent's heart to kill them. *

- Survival: Dodge different types of ninja stars as long as you can. After you die
you will be fast-forwarded to a slightly easier difficulty than the one you
experienced getting your highest score.

- Hunt: Touch as many hearts as you can before time runs out. Each touch the
timer will reset, but be a little less lenient. Score increases based on how quickly
you touch each heart.

There are three game variants:

- No Switching

- Switch Positions: You can press a button to instantly swap positions of the
heart and star.

- Switch Control: You own two pairs of heart and stars and you can switch the
current heart and star you are controlling independently. A heart or a star not
being controlled will continue moving in its previous speed and direction. **

Controls:

- Keyboard: Use WASD to control the heart and the arrow keys for the star.
Switching is controlled by the Control, Shift, or Alt keys. During gameplay the
Escape key pauses the game.

- Gamepad: Use the left joystick to control the heart and the right joystick for the
star. Switching is controlled by the triggers or shoulder buttons. During gameplay
the center buttons pause the game.

Notes:

- To Battle a human player your must have at least one gamepad. Two gamepads is suggested.

* Online multiplayer will be added soon as an option in Battle.
** Switch Control versus AI will be added soon as an option in Battle.
